name: ksef-accountant-en
description: National e-Invoice System (KSeF) accounting assistant — domain knowledge, architectural patterns and code examples. Does not contain executable code.

KSEF_TOKEN.description: KSeF API token for session authentication. Provided by the user — the skill does not generate, store or transmit tokens.

KSEF_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Fernet encryption key for secure token storage. Usage is optional — an example of a security pattern.

KSEF_BASE_URL.description: KSeF API base URL. Defaults to https://ksef-demo.mf.gov.pl (DEMO). Production requires explicit user consent.
